::Composer/Triggerhappy/Orchestra::

          Composer crosses his arms.

           "Let's see what our work has accomplished," He said.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
          Triggerhappy gets hit in the right wing by Prowl's shots, and
damages it, making Triggerhappy lose balance, tilting to the left a bit.
Then, suddenly, Triggerhappy is hit by Brainstorm's photon blasts from
behind, damaging him some more.  Triggerhappy tries to turn around, but is
hit by Chromedome's shots, and now he is badly damaged.

          "And I thought Autobots were bad, these Maximals are like giant
bumblebees with an extralarge stinger!" He said to himself.

           Triggerhappy is starting to go down, his engines had been a
little damaged as well.  Triggerhappy didn't have the logic to retreat, and
so he turned around and began firing his photon blasters at Prowl.  This
Prowl was bugging him, Prowl was very fast, and had a sleek body.
Triggerhappy would strike him down if it was the last thing he did in this
battle.  Of course, Triggerhappy didn't have to fight alone.  He shouted
down to Motormaster and the others, trying to make himself clear over his
engines.  The ash started to get to him and his optics too.

          "Hey guys!  We gotta scrap these muthas!!!" He yelled down.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         Orchestra ran after Blacknightmare.  He went to her side.

          "It's been a while since I last engaged in combat.  The last time
I ever saw the face of war was centuries ago, when I was along Composer's
side, always trying to do my stealthy work, but also observing the battles,"
He said.

         Orchestra slowly moved his arm towards Blacknightmare, slowly and
silently attempting to put his arm around her waist.
